TEXT.P: The table at left shows the proportion that each energy source contributed to global energy production in 2000.
Nonrenewable energy sources exist in finite amounts that can't be replenished once consumed. Renewable energy sources cannot be depleted.
Which of these energy sources are renewable?
Check the boxes next to energy sources that are renewable, then press "Check Answers." When you've correctly identified the renewable energy sources, the graph will be drawn.
